name: .GRK File Extension
summary: Learn about .GRK files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Gradebook created with Gradekeeper, a school attendance and grade tracking program; stores grades and attendance information for all students in a class.

content: Student attendance, as well as homework and test scores, can be recorded using a Palm OS or Pocket PC device with Gradekeeper software installed. The data can later be transferred to a Macintosh or Windows computer.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
